name: TrackbackShotR
author: Ahmet Topal

sections.description:
EasyGravatar is a Plugin to show the gravatars of Commentators, but Trackbacks and Pingbacks haven’t got Email adresses, so they can’t have a gravatar. For this, i have create a Plugin named TrackBackShotR which shows instead a gravatar a snapshot of the Blog of the TB or PB. You can use this with EasyGravatars, because it doesn’t change anything with comments, just with TB and PB

Localization

  • English * Author: Ahmet Topal
sections.installation: Just upload the .php file and activate it, more under setting/TrackbackShotR
